description.para: Design and maintenance for a variety of serverless data applications in Go leveraging AWS Lambda, Kinesis, Kafka, NATS JetStream, DynamoDB, and Postgres. Managing cloud infrastructure with Terraform and Ansible. Developing Grafana dashboards for real time monitoring of application, infrastructure performance, and availability metrics.

Development of an enterprise blockchain application platform building on Hyperledger Fabric. Development and maintenance of Go microservices and AWS Lambda functions connecting users and third-parties with blockchains. Leading development of embedded Lisp interpreter and Go SDK to streamline smart contract development for customers. Configuration and maintenance of system infrastructure and application management in AWS with Terraform and Ansible. Extensive Python and Bash scripting for deploying and managing smart contract operations. Transitioning complex Fabric distributed systems from AWS EC2 to Kubernetes using Helm. Implementation of platform monitoring and alerting with Prometheus and Grafana.

Primary development of backend data processing systems using Go and Python, along with related maintenance on existing related systems. Development of service packaging and deployment methodologies and the tooling to support them. Dev-Ops tasks including system/service configuration, glue and tooling development, monitoring and alerting system integrations, and responding to critical system events.

Development of OpenID and OAuth integrations for social networks. Primary development of backend components of a user/session management offering. Participant in product design discussions. Responsible for meeting deadlines with rapid customer rollout. Responsible for training the internal user base and facilitating adoption of a new product.
